title: Episode 97: Valentine’s Day with Shane Welch
description:
It’s that time of year! Tune in for a special Valentine’s Day themed episode of Let’s Eat In as Cathy Erway sits and chats with her date, Shane Welch, founder and head brewmaster of Sixpoint Craft Ales. Shane talks about how beer brings people together and some of the future plans he has for the ever-evolving brewery. Tune in and hear what his ideal date meals are and why he’s really into high end seafood lately. This program was sponsored by Hearst Ranch.

“[Beer] is an opportunity to connect with people…Just today a guy wrote me about how he thinks the beer tastes better in cans.”

“Getting our beer to the Midwest would be a dream.”

–Shane Welch of Sixpoint Craft Ales on Let’s Eat In
author: info@heritageradionetwork.org (Heritage Radio Network)
